titleStmt.title: Ane co[m]pendious [buik] of godlie psalmes and spirit[uall sangis] collectit furthe of sindrie ... Scripture ...
titleStmt.author: Wedderburn, John, ca. 1500-1556.
Wedderburn, James, ca. 1495-1553.
Wedderburn, Robert, ca. 1510-ca. 1557.

notesStmt.note: T.p. torn; part of title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Scottish hymns and versions of Psalms, ascribed to John Wedderburn, and his brothers James and Robert; many based on German or Swiss originals--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Part of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Signatures: [pi]⁸ A-N⁸ (last leaf blank or lacking).
Pages 81 and 182 misnumbered as 82 and 482 respectively.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
